php 并发写文件|文件锁

Published: 12 Sep 2014 Category: php

php 并发写文件|文件锁

 1 <?php
 2 $fp = fopen('b.txt', 'w+');
 3 if (flock($fp, LOCK_EX)) { // 进行排它锁定
 4  fwrite($fp, 'Write something here\n');
 5  flock($fp, LOCK_UN);
 6 } else {
 7  echo "Couldn't lock the file !";
 8 }
 9 fclose($fp);
10 ?>

php文件锁
